org.microbean.helm.maven

Class RollbackReleaseMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractHelmMojo
        • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractReleaseMojo
          • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractSingleReleaseMojo
            • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractMutatingReleaseMojo
              • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractForceableMutatingReleaseMojo
                • org.microbean.helm.maven.RollbackReleaseMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextEnabled, Mojo

    @Mojo(name="rollback")
public class RollbackReleaseMojo
extends AbstractForceableMutatingReleaseMojo
    Rolls a release back to a prior version.
    Author:
    Laird Nelson

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        protected void execute(Callable<ReleaseManager> releaseManagerCallable)
                throws Exception
        Performs a release-oriented task using a ReleaseManager available from the supplied Callable.

        This implementation rolls a named release back to a prior version.

        Specified by:
        execute in class AbstractReleaseMojo
        Parameters:
        releaseManagerCallable - the Callable that will provide a ReleaseManager; must not be null
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs

      • getVersion

        public Integer getVersion()
        Returns the version of the release to roll back to.

        This method may return null.

        Overrides of this method are permitted to return null.

        Returns:
        the version of the release to roll back to, or null
        See Also:
        setVersion(Integer)

      • setVersion

        public void setVersion(Integer version)
        Sets the version of the release to roll back to.
        Parameters:
        version - the version to roll back to; must not be null
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if version is null
        See Also:
        getVersion()
